description.value: In moments of viciousness, your curse can partially infect your prey. Whenever you critically succeed with an unarmed attack from the werecreature archetype, the target must attempt a Fortitude save against the higher of your class DC or spell DC, or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2} until the beginning of your next turn as their bones elongate and form warps. On a critical failure, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} for one minute as the transformation lingers.
